turns.content: create an example 3 tier taxonomy of 50 categories at a clothing company

Tier 1: Clothing Type

1. Men's Clothing
2. Women's Clothing
3. Unisex Clothing
4. Children's Clothing
5. Infant's Clothing

Tier 2: Clothing Category (Subcategories)

Men's Clothing:
1.1. T-shirts
1.2. Dress Shirts
1.3. Casual Shirts
1.4. Pants
1.5. Jeans
1.6. Shorts
1.7. Sportswear
1.8. Swimwear
1.9. Outerwear
1.10. Suits

Women's Clothing:
2.1. Tops
2.2. Blouses
2.3. Dresses
2.4. Skirts
2.5. Pants
2.6. Jeans
2.7. Shorts
2.8. Sportswear
2.9. Swimwear
2.10. Outerwear

Unisex Clothing:
3.1. T-shirts
3.2. Hoodies
3.3. Sweatshirts
3.4. Sweatpants
3.5. Jackets

Children's Clothing:
4.1. Tops
4.2. Pants
4.3. Jeans
4.4. Dresses
4.5. Skirts
4.6. Shorts
4.7. Sportswear
4.8. Swimwear
4.9. Outerwear

Infant's Clothing:
5.1. Onesies
5.2. Rompers
5.3. Sleepwear
5.4. Tops
5.5. Pants
5.6. Dresses
5.7. Skirts
5.8. Outerwear

This taxonomy consists of 50 subcategories for a clothing company, divided into 5 main categories (Tier 1) and their respective subcategories (Tier 2).
